verses.verse: It shall <S%H1697>happen,<s%> when all these things have <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H1293>you,<s%> the blessing and the <S%H7045>curse,<s%> which I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7725>you,<s%> and you shall call them to <S%H3824>mind<s%> among all the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> where <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has driven <S%H5080>you,<s%>

and shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and shall <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> according to all that I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> you and your <S%H1121>children,<s%> with all your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and with all your <S%H5315>soul;<s%>

that then <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H7725>turn<s%> your <S%H7622>captivity,<s%> and have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on <S%H7725>you,<s%> and will return and <S%H6908>gather<s%> you from all the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> where <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has scattered <S%H6327>you.<s%>

If your <S%H5080>outcasts<s%> are in the <S%H7097>uttermost<s%> parts of the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> from there will <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H3947>you,<s%> and from there he will bring you back:

and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H776>land<s%> which your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3423>possessed,<s%> and you shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H3190>it;<s%> and he will do you good, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> you above your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H4135>circumcise<s%> your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of your <S%H2233>seed,<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with all your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and with all your <S%H5315>soul,<s%> that you may <S%H2416>live.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5414>put<s%> all these <S%H423>curses<s%> on your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and on those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H7291>you,<s%> who persecuted you.

You shall <S%H7725>return<s%> and <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> all his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will make you <S%H3498>plenteous<s%> in all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H990>body,<s%> and in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H929>livestock,<s%> and in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>ground,<s%> for <S%H2896>good:<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> over you for <S%H2896>good,<s%> as he <S%H7797>rejoiced<s%> over your <S%H1>fathers;<s%>

if you shall <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> which are <S%H3789>written<s%> in this <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law;<s%> if you <S%H7725>turn<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with all your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and with all your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
For this <S%H4687>commandment<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> it is not too <S%H6381>hard<s%> for <S%H7350>you,<s%> neither is it far off.

It is not in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> that you should <S%H559>say,<s%> "Who shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> for us to <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H3947>bring<s%> it to <S%H8085>us,<s%> and make us to hear <S%H6213>it,<s%> that we may do it?"

Neither is it <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> that you should <S%H559>say,<s%> "Who shall <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5676>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> for <S%H3947>us,<s%> and bring it to <S%H8085>us,<s%> and make us to hear <S%H6213>it,<s%> that we may do it?"
But the <S%H1697>word<s%> is <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H6310>you,<s%> in your mouth, and in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> that you may do <S%H6213>it.<s%>
<S%H7200>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%> and <S%H2896>good,<s%> and <S%H4194>death<s%> and <S%H7451>evil;<s%>

in that I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and his <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> that you may <S%H2421>live<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> and that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in the <S%H776>land<s%> where you <S%H935>go<s%> in to possess <S%H3423>it.<s%>

But if your <S%H3824>heart<s%> turns <S%H6437>away,<s%> and you will not <S%H8085>hear,<s%> but shall be drawn <S%H5080>away,<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and serve <S%H5647>them;<s%>

I <S%H5046>denounce<s%> to you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> that you shall <S%H6>surely<s%> <S%H6>perish;<s%> you shall not <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H127>land,<s%> where you pass <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> in to possess <S%H3423>it.<s%>

I <S%H5749>call<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H5749>witness<s%> against you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> that I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H2416>life<s%> and <S%H4194>death,<s%> the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> and the <S%H7045>curse:<s%> therefore <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H2416>life,<s%> that you may <S%H2421>live,<s%> you and your <S%H2233>seed;<s%>

to <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and to <S%H1692>cling<s%> to <S%H2416>him;<s%> for he is your life, and the <S%H753>length<s%> of your <S%H3117>days;<s%> that you may <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> to give <S%H5414>them.<s%>
